00008 #include <mt/file/FileError.h>
00009 #include <mt/common/Exception.h>
00010 
00011 #include <errno.h>
00012 #include <string.h>
00013 
00014 namespace mt {
00015 
00016 void FileError::handleLastError(const std::string& path) {
00017     switch (errno) {
00018     case EIO:
00019         throw IOException(path);
00020     case EPERM:
00021         throw FileAccessDeniedException("insufficient permissions", path);
00022     case EACCES:
00023         throw FileAccessDeniedException(path);
00024     case ENOENT:
00025         throw FileNotFoundException(path);
00026     case ENOTDIR:
00027         throw OpenFileException("not a directory", path);
00028     case EISDIR:
00029         throw OpenFileException("not a file", path);
00030     case EROFS:
00031         throw FileReadOnlyException(path);
00032     case EEXIST:
00033         throw FileExistsException(path);
00034     case ENOSPC:
00035         throw FileException("no space left on device", path);
00036     case EDQUOT:
00037         throw FileException("disk quota exceeded", path);
00038     case ENOTEMPTY:
00039         throw FileException("directory not empty", path);
00040     case ENAMETOOLONG:
00041         throw PathSyntaxException(path);
00042     case ENFILE:
00043     case EMFILE:
00044         throw FileException("too many open files", path);
00045     default:
00046         throw FileException(strerror(errno), path);
00047     }
00048 }
00049 
00050 } // namespace mt
